title: About NUGSA Germany
subtitle: National Union of Ghanaian Student Associations

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: The National Union of Ghanaian Student Associations (NUGSA) Foundation is a Student-Led Autonomous and Non-Political, Non-Racial and Non-Religious umbrella organisation for Ghanaian Student, Scholars and Academics in the Diaspora.

slogan.title: Slogan & Emblem
slogan.education: Education: a right not a privilege

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To Mobilise and Organise all Ghanaian Students, Scholars & Academics in the diaspora to engineer the Rebirth of our national vision.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: For Ghana to be the Central Hub of Development in Africa.

values.title: Our Values
values.content: Unity, Freedom, Education, Inclusion, Respect and Development

objectives.title: Our Objectives
objectives.subtitle: The core aims that drive our activities and initiatives across Germany

rights.title: Rights & Interests
rights.description: To champion and preserve the rights and interests of all Ghanaian students' resident in Germany.

international.title: International Relations
international.description: To promote co-operation, understanding and friendship between Ghanaian students and others from diverse orientations.

culture.title: Cultural Heritage
culture.description: To inculcate discipline and revolutionary awareness of our cultural heritage and provide means to promote it.

panAfrican.title: Pan-Africanism
panAfrican.description: To promote Pan-Africanism and foster unity among Ghanaian students and other students of African descent.

leadership.title: Our Executives
leadership.subtitle: Meet the dedicated executives driving our mission forward
leadership.filterByName: Filter by name e.g: Paul Abrokwa...
leadership.noMembers: No active board members found for this year.

constitution.title: NUGSA Constitution
constitution.subtitle: Our governing document that guides our operations and principles

closing.quote: There is only one Ghana, Our Ghana, the gateway to Africa - Our Homeland, and together, we shall make Ghana the
